channel.title: RuneLog v1.0 (Uses Winsock functions)
channel.description: Well, I made this little program in a few minutes, its probably the first program of its kind, useing pure winsock, this is more of a example program, what it does is counts how many sharks you have caught. It uses pure winsock functions, which means it does not search for color or text; it searches for data strings and then performs the action I want it too, it is 100% undetectable, that is for this program. If it used the same mouse clicks to perform the same actions then it will be detected, but this program just counts the data it looks for, i could of made it click or talk but i didnt feel like it right now and probably would get you banned, and i may work on it later, a auto login would be very easy and probably undetectable i may throw one of them in it later :P[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 10:18:47 PM[/size][hr]knobody cares, maybe ill get to work on that universal lightbulb changer

item.title: RuneLog v1.0 (Uses Winsock functions)
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

BobDole81:

I see no evidence of any malicious intentions

no? my personal feeling, whithout the file still to hand, was a botnet. Why else would there be a welcomer to an IRC channel?

Read full topic

I’m removing this temporarily. I see no evidence of any malicious intentions, but I would like to know why you included something called CokeWhack and/or a CokeStudios chat…I haven’t tried it out myself, but I’ll give it a go on my other old comp later on.

this means we could probably have semi-packet bots in the future. Reading variables from packets, using them to macro efficiently.

item.title: RuneLog v1.0 (Uses Winsock functions)
item.dc:creator: @clintster clintster
item.description:
@clintster wrote:

Yeah people seem to be doubting this, saying there packets are 100% encryption, not true, in this program it searches for the data “You catch a shark!”, thats pure text, any function you do on runescape i could find it from the program, by the music packet or the data packet that puts the coal etc. in your bag, or even the emotion packet that peforms the actions, there sometimes hard to find but are all there when you do actions like woodcut, fish etc…

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLog v1.0 (Uses Winsock functions)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Sorry, but I think you posted it in the wrong section in terms of wanting replies. This DOES look very interesting though, plan on releasing the source? I reckon if this does work(I can’t test right no), it would create a new view on RS cheating.

Read full topic
